overview: Gold digging MILF step mother Mindi Mink wins over her judgmental step daughter Lucy Doll by treating her to a night with a former pornstar. When MILF Jelena Jensen magically wakes up in her teen stepdaughter Nina North's body, they rediscover themselves by having supernaturally hot sex. When teen step daughter Adria Rae gets dumped by her first boyfriend, step mother Syren De Mer helps mend her broken heart with TLC and a movie. Block parent Elexis Monroe takes in her troubled teen neighbor Gia Page who can't cope with her overprotective dad.
title: Her Special Day
